catalog_info.title: Intermediate Swahili
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Swahili A or the equivalent of one year's study of Swahili.
catalog_info.description: Continuation of Swahili A. A study of the lingua franca of East Africa at the elementary level. Contact hours supplemented by language lab sessions. Emphasis on written expression, reading comprehension, and oral fluency.  Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
